{|class="infobox bordered" style="float:right; width:264px; font-size:90%; text-align:left; border:2px solid #94493a; padding:3px;" cellpadding="3" |- !colspan="2" style="font-size:110%; text-align:center; background-color:#960018; color:#FFF;" | {{{name}}} |- {{#if:{{{image|}}} | {{!}} colspan="2" style="text-align:center;" {{!}}{{{image}}}{{#if:{{{symbol|}}}|
{{{symbol}}}}}{{#if:{{{caption|}}}|
{{{caption}}}}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{price|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#c41e3a; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Price''' {{!}}{{{price}}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{location|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#c41e3a; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Catch time''' {{!}}{{{catchTime}}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{location|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#c41e3a; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Catch rate''' {{!}}+{{{catchRate}}} {{!}}- }} {{#if:{{{location|}}} | {{!}} style="background-color:#c41e3a; color:#000;" {{!}}'''Locations''' {{!}}{{{location}}} {{!}}- }} |} == Code ==
